message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers.
I'm sticking to a fair split. It's the most rational choice.
I'm willing to get closer to a fair split, but I still want a bit more.
Alice, we're running out of time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit. Let's be logical here.
